text:
I installed 1.2RC2 on Windows 2000 and have these effects:

1. an attempt is made to start Lenya. That failes because port 8888 is said to 
be used by something else. (FeedReader seems to be responsible for that problem)

2. there are no items in the start menu as they were for 1.2RC1

It is a nice idea to automatically start the software - but I do not like that 
to happen without beeing asked.
creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
gregor@apache.org
text: the menu item now shows up again
